text: a small community in the Pacific Northwest a dynamic company is growing this company has served the equipment dealer market for 30 years they did it by following their principles by being the best and by being honest to their customers disis technology driven people focused [Music] I think the unique thing about Johnson Tractor and maybe it isn't unique to us but our industry is an awful lot of hard work in the spring and the fall I came from the banking world and we worked hard there but this is different the pace in the spring and the fall is very hectic we try to do what we can to keep our customers going and eliminate any downtime they might have and I see our employees giving 110 120% during those times and I think that is unique they seem tired sometimes but happy to do it uh it's a it's a different pace and it isn't for everybody but we have surrounded ourselves with an awful lot of good people who are very committed to their jobs and I think that's good for us and it's especially good for our customers and I think employees have a way of of working with each other and teaching each other um they sort of start to learn and I think we all have what's acceptable in a workplace and what is the norm um Leon Eric worked very hard during the those busy months too and I think that's an example um we try to be flexible with our employees as far as we don't want them to miss family events and and trying to schedule their time appropriately so I think they see that and then are willing to make go the extra mile when we need them as well um so I I think they learn from each other I think we all try to have a team approach um it's fun to see them problem solving with a technician and a parts person and maybe Leo and Eric all working on something together to get a farmer going and that's what it's all about and and I think they enjoy the [Music] challenge in a small community in the Pacific Northwest a dynamic company is is growing this company has
